_readme: Azure OpenAI configuration for enterprise deployments - copy to appsettings.Development.json to use

_availableModels.note: Azure OpenAI uses deployment names, not model IDs. Deploy models in Azure Portal first.

gpt-4o-mini.description: Fast and cost-effective for most tasks

apiKey.setup: Set ApiKey in config or AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY environment variable

azureAD.description: Azure Active Directory authentication via DefaultAzureCredential
azureAD.setup: Set UseAzureAD to true, ensure Azure CLI is logged in or managed identity is configured

_environmentVariables.AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY: API key (if not using Azure AD)

steps: 1. Create Azure OpenAI resource in Azure Portal
2. Deploy a model (e.g., gpt-4o-mini) in Azure OpenAI Studio
3. Copy the endpoint URL and API key
4. Set DeploymentName to match your Azure deployment name
5. Configure authentication (API key or Azure AD)
